source.inline: HOUR=$(date +%H); if [ $HOUR -ge 6 ] && [ $HOUR -lt 8 ]; then echo "üåÖ $(date '+%a %I:%M %p')"; elif [ $HOUR -ge 8 ] && [ $HOUR -lt 18 ]; then echo "‚òÄÔ∏è $(date '+%a %I:%M %p')"; elif [ $HOUR -ge 18 ] && [ $HOUR -lt 20 ]; then echo "üåá $(date '+%a %I:%M %p')"; else echo "üåô $(date '+%a %I:%M %p')"; fi

BAT=$(pmset -g batt | grep -o '[0-9]*%' | cut -d% -f1); MODE=$(pmset -g | grep lowpowermode | awk '{print $2}'); TIME=$(pmset -g batt | grep -o '[0-9]\{1,2\}:[0-9]\{2\}' || echo '(??)'); CHARGING=$(pmset -g batt | grep "charging" > /dev/null && echo '‚ö°Ô∏è' || echo ''); if [ "$MODE" = '1' ]; then if [ "$TIME" = '(??)' ]; then echo "‚ö°Ô∏è ${BAT}% "; else echo "‚ö°Ô∏è ${BAT}% ($TIME)"; fi; else if [ "$TIME" = '(??)' ]; then echo "üîã ${BAT}%"; else echo "üîã ${BAT}% ($TIME)"; fi; fi

actionAppleScript.inline: tell application "System Events" to do shell script "if [ $(pmset -g | grep lowpowermode | awk '{print $2}') = '1' ]; then pmset -a lowpowermode 0 && osascript -e 'display notification \"Low Power Mode has been disabled\" with title \"Power Mode Changed\"'; else pmset -a lowpowermode 1 && osascript -e 'display notification \"Low Power Mode has been enabled\" with title \"Power Mode Changed\"'; fi" with administrator privileges

source.inline: VOL=$(osascript -e 'output volume of (get volume settings)'); echo "üîä ${VOL}%"

BRIGHT=$(brightness -l | grep -i 'brightness' | awk '{print int($NF * 100)}'); if [ $BRIGHT -ge 70 ]; then echo "üîÜ ${BRIGHT}%"; elif [ $BRIGHT -ge 30 ]; then echo "üå§ ${BRIGHT}%"; else echo "üí° ${BRIGHT}%"; fi
